c74object.name: orchidea.db.query
c74object.description: Queries an orchidea database to obtain specific samples or to get occurring items

inlet.digest: File or files containing the database (usually ending with .db)

method.name: getinfo
method.description: The message getinfo followed by a filename reports the database information about such filename

method.name: getitems
method.digest: Obtain occurring items of a specific type
method.description: The message items followed by one or more symbols (determining the items class) will return a list containing all the occurrences of those specific class in the database. For instance, items dynamics will return all the dynamics in the dataset, while items instruments will return all the instruments and items styles pitches will return all the styles and all the pitches. Allowed classes names are: "instruments", "dynamics", "styles", "pitches", "others"

method.name: grep
method.digest: Search for samples matching a regular expression
method.description: The message grep followed by a regular expression will return all the samples in the database that match the specific regular expression. As wildcards, '.' stands for "any character", '*' stands for "appearing at least zero times", '^' matches the beginning of the string and '$' the end. For instance, grep .*Fl.*4.*pp retrieves all the flute samples in the fourth octave playing pianissimo.

method.name: symbol/list
method.description: A symbol or a list of symbols in the second inlet is considered as the filename(s) of the database(s) that should be queried.

attribute.name: parallel
attribute.description: When this attribute is 1, the computations are performed in a separate thread.

entry.name: Inlet 2 (symbol/list)
entry.description: File or files containing the database (usually ending with .db).
